attributes.action: Call for a suspension of rent payments during the coronavirus outbreak
attributes.additional_details:
London Renters Union has sent an open letter to the London mayor, Sadiq Khan, urging him to join them in fighting to end rent payments and evictions, housing the homeless to protect them against the pandemic, and ensuring that homes are fit for people to self isolate in.
They are concerned that renters may be forced to work during the pandemic to keep a roof over their heads.
attributes.background: Call for a suspension of rent payments during the coronavirus outbreak

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302256

Please note that we can't accept petitions which aren't started with a full name.
